subject: feat: rename app, add alpha label, and download as PDF button
body:
- Change app name from "see-veo (CV oh!)" to "this is a cv"
- Add alpha badge next to the app name in the header
- Add "Download as PDF" button that triggers the browser print dialog
  (users can select "Save as PDF" as the destination)
